title: Looking for casuals with teamspeak
body: Hey anyone looking for a casual and has teamspeak? I'm looking to join someone with a teamspeak server or a clan. Basically just looking for friends haha. But yea add me if u guys keen

replies.body: If you're looking to talk to League people about League or League people not about League, drop on into the [**Community Discord chat**](http://wrenchmen.org/invite) :) It's not necessarily TeamSpeak, but it's pretty much the same idea!
cheers ill keep that in mind
